verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H3372>"Don't<s%> be afraid, neither be <S%H2865>dismayed.<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> with <S%H6965>you,<s%> and arise, go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H5857>Ai.<s%> <S%H7200>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai,<s%> with his <S%H5971>people,<s%> his <S%H5892>city,<s%> and his <S%H776>land.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H5857>Ai<s%> and her <S%H4428>king<s%> as you <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> and her <S%H4428>king,<s%> except its <S%H7998>spoil<s%> and its <S%H929>livestock,<s%> you shall take for a <S%H962>plunder<s%> for <S%H7760>yourselves.<s%> Set an <S%H693>ambush<s%> for the <S%H5892>city<s%> behind <S%H310>it.<s%>"

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> to go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H5857>Ai.<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H977>chose<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1368>men,<s%> the mighty <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> and sent them <S%H7971>out<s%> by <S%H3915>night.<s%>

He <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> saying, <S%H7200>"Behold,<s%> you shall lie in <S%H693>ambush<s%> against the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%> <S%H7368>Don't<s%> go <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from the <S%H5892>city,<s%> but all of you be <S%H3559>ready.<s%>

<S%H5971>I,<s%> and all the people who are with <S%H7126>me,<s%> will approach to the <S%H5892>city.<s%> It shall <S%H3318>happen,<s%> when they come out <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H7223>us,<s%> as at the first, that we will <S%H5127>flee<s%> before <S%H6440>them.<s%>

They will come <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5423>us,<s%> until we have drawn them away from the <S%H5892>city;<s%> for they will <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H5127><s%> 'They flee <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7223>us,<s%> like the first <S%H5127>time.<s%>' So we will flee before <S%H6440>them,<s%>

and you shall rise <S%H6965>up<s%> from the <S%H693>ambush,<s%> and take <S%H3423>possession<s%> of the <S%H5892>city;<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> it into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

It shall <S%H8610>be,<s%> when you have seized on the <S%H5892>city,<s%> that you shall <S%H3341>set<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> on <S%H784>fire.<s%> You shall <S%H6213>do<s%> this according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H7200>Behold,<s%> I have commanded <S%H6680>you.<s%>"

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> sent them <S%H7971>out;<s%> and they <S%H3212>went<s%> to set up the <S%H3993>ambush,<s%> and <S%H3427>stayed<s%> between <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> and <S%H5857>Ai,<s%> on the west <S%H3220>side<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai;<s%> but <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3885>stayed<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H3915>night.<s%>

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> <S%H6485>mustered<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and went <S%H5927>up,<s%> he and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H5857>Ai.<s%>

All the <S%H5971>people,<s%> even the men of <S%H4421>war<s%> who were with <S%H5927>him,<s%> went up, and drew <S%H5066>near,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> before the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> on the north <S%H6828>side<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai.<s%> Now there was a <S%H1516>valley<s%> between him and <S%H5857>Ai.<s%>

He <S%H3947>took<s%> about <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> them in <S%H693>ambush<s%> between <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> and <S%H5857>Ai,<s%> on the west <S%H3220>side<s%> of the <S%H5857>city.<s%>

So they <S%H7760>set<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> even all the <S%H4264>army<s%> who was on the <S%H6828>north<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and their <S%H6119>ambush<s%> on the <S%H3220>west<s%> of the <S%H5892>city;<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> that <S%H3915>night<s%> into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6010>valley.<s%>

It <S%H4428>happened,<s%> when the king of <S%H5857>Ai<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H4116>it,<s%> that they hurried and rose up <S%H7925>early,<s%> and the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> he and all his <S%H5971>people,<s%> at the time <S%H4150>appointed,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6160>Arabah;<s%> but he <S%H3045>didn't<s%> know that there was an <S%H693>ambush<s%> against him <S%H310>behind<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>
<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> made as if they were <S%H5060>beaten<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5127>them,<s%> and fled by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

All the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were in the <S%H5857>city<s%> were <S%H2199>called<s%> together to <S%H7291>pursue<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H310>them.<s%> They <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and were drawn <S%H5423>away<s%> from the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

There was not a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7604>left<s%> in <S%H5857>Ai<s%> or Beth <S%H1008>El<s%> who <S%H3318>didn't<s%> go out <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> They <S%H5800>left<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H6605>open,<s%> and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> "Stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> the <S%H3591>javelin<s%> that is in your <S%H3027>hand<s%> toward <S%H5857>Ai,<s%> for I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>" <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> the <S%H3591>javelin<s%> that was in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> toward the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

The <S%H693>ambush<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> <S%H4120>quickly<s%> out of their <S%H4725>place,<s%> and they <S%H7323>ran<s%> as soon as he had stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H935>entered<s%> into the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H4116>it.<s%> They hurried and <S%H3341>set<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> on <S%H784>fire.<s%>

When the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%> <S%H6437>looked<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> <S%H6437>them,<s%> they saw, and <S%H6227>behold,<s%> the smoke of the <S%H5892>city<s%> ascended <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and they had no <S%H3027>power<s%> to <S%H5127>flee<s%> this way or that <S%H2008>way.<s%> The <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H5127>fled<s%> to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> turned <S%H2015>back<s%> on the <S%H7291>pursuers.<s%>

When <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H693>ambush<s%> had <S%H3920>taken<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and that the <S%H6227>smoke<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H5927>ascended,<s%> then they turned <S%H7725>again,<s%> and <S%H5221>killed<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai.<s%>

The <S%H428>others<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H8432>them,<s%> so they were in the midst of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> some on this <S%H5221>side,<s%> and some on that side. They struck <S%H5704>them,<s%> so that they <S%H7604>let<s%> none of them <S%H8300>remain<s%> or <S%H6412>escape.<s%>
They <S%H8610>captured<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%> <S%H2416>alive,<s%> and <S%H7126>brought<s%> him to <S%H3091>Joshua.<s%>

It <S%H3478>happened,<s%> when Israel had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H2026>killing<s%> all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> in which they <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H5307>them,<s%> and they had all fallen by the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> until they were <S%H8552>consumed,<s%> that all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H5857>Ai,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>
All that <S%H5307>fell<s%> that <S%H3117>day,<s%> both of <S%H376>men<s%> and <S%H802>women,<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H505>thousand,<s%> even all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai.<s%>

For <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7725>didn't<s%> draw <S%H7725>back<s%> his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> with which he stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> the <S%H3591>javelin,<s%> until he had utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai.<s%>

Only the <S%H929>livestock<s%> and the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of that <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> took for <S%H962>prey<s%> to <S%H1697>themselves,<s%> according to the word of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> which he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua.<s%>
So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H8313>burnt<s%> <S%H5857>Ai,<s%> and <S%H7760>made<s%> it a <S%H8510>heap<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> even a <S%H8077>desolation,<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

He <S%H8518>hanged<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%> on a <S%H6086>tree<s%> until the <S%H6256>evening,<s%> and at <S%H8121>the<s%> <S%H935>sundown<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> and they <S%H3381>took<s%> his <S%H5038>body<s%> <S%H935>down<s%> from the <S%H6086>tree,<s%> and <S%H7993>threw<s%> it at the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H6965>raised<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1530>heap<s%> of <S%H68>stones<s%> on it that remains to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>
Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> in <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5858>Ebal,<s%>

as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> as it is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H8003>uncut<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> on which no man had lifted <S%H5130>up<s%> any <S%H1270>iron.<s%> They <S%H5927>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> on it to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> peace <S%H5930>offerings.<s%>

He <S%H3789>wrote<s%> there on the <S%H68>stones<s%> a <S%H4932>copy<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> which he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

All <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and their <S%H2205>elders<s%> and <S%H7860>officers,<s%> and their <S%H8199>judges,<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> on this side of the <S%H727>ark<s%> and on that side before the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> who <S%H5375>carried<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> the <S%H1616>foreigner<s%> as well as the <S%H249>native;<s%> <S%H2677>half<s%> of them <S%H413>in<s%> <S%H4136>front<s%> of <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H1630>Gerizim,<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> of them in <S%H4136>front<s%> of <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5858>Ebal,<s%> as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> at the <S%H7223>first,<s%> that they should <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H310>Afterward<s%> he <S%H7121>read<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H8451>law,<s%> the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> and the <S%H7045>curse,<s%> according to all that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law.<s%>

There was not a <S%H1697>word<s%> of all that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> which <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7121>didn't<s%> read before all the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> with the <S%H802>women,<s%> the little <S%H2945>ones,<s%> and the <S%H1616>foreigners<s%> who <S%H1980>were<s%> among <S%H7130>them.<s%>
